document_data.name: Sashara Keenspear
document_data.mainbody: '''Sashara Keenspear''' was a famous [[genasi]] mercenary who operated as a "[[kraken hunter]]" out of [[Westgate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/A Stab in the Dark|8}}
document_data.Activities:
She was known to take an interest in the movements of the city of [[Xxiphu]].

It was rumored that curious [[adventurer]]s could find her in the private rooms of the ''[[Shell Queen]]'' or inspecting the ships in Westgate's harbor.
document_data.Possessions: She wielded a glowing, {{SIAdj|30|foot|long=yes|adj=long}} [[spear]] inscribed with runes.
document_data.Relationships: Sashara worked and took meals with [[Yu Kai]], a fellow famous kraken hunter.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Sashara was regarded as perhaps the only so-called "kraken hunter" in Westgate who might have actually slain a [[kraken]].
